typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		{Validation Flag} as double,
		Customer as string,
		{Domestic or Export} as string,
		Species as string,
		{Product Type} as string,
		{Delivery Point} as string,
		{Price Point} as double,
		{Sales Unit} as string,
		{Sales Quantity} as double,
		{Average Sales Price} as double,
		{Sales Revenue} as double,
		{Production Cost} as double,
		Stumpage as double,
		{Unit Stumpage} as double,
		Currency as string,
		Month as date,
		{Budget Sales Quantity} as double,
		{Budget Sales Revenue} as double,
		{Budget Production Cost} as double,
		{Budget Unit Stumpage} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipLines: 1,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
SourceDataTab derive(CustomerValidateMsg = iif((length(trim(Customer)) > 0 || not(isNull(Customer))), "", "Customer"),
		DomesticExportValidateMsg = iif((length(trim({Domestic or Export})) > 0 || not(isNull({Domestic or Export}))), "", "Domestic or Export")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',CustomerValidateMsg,DomesticExportValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		{Validation Flag},
		Customer,
		{Domestic or Export},
		Species,
		{Product Type},
		{Delivery Point},
		{Price Point},
		{Sales Unit},
		{Sales Quantity},
		{Average Sales Price},
		{Sales Revenue},
		{Production Cost},
		Stumpage,
		{Unit Stumpage},
		Currency,
		Month,
		{Budget Sales Quantity},
		{Budget Sales Revenue},
		{Budget Production Cost},
		{Budget Unit Stumpage}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutput
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concatWS("/", CustomerValidateMsg, DomesticExportValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		{Validation Flag},
		Customer,
		{Domestic or Export},
		Species,
		{Product Type},
		{Delivery Point},
		{Price Point},
		{Sales Unit},
		{Sales Quantity},
		{Average Sales Price},
		{Sales Revenue},
		{Production Cost},
		Stumpage,
		{Unit Stumpage},
		Currency,
		Month,
		{Budget Sales Quantity},
		{Budget Sales Revenue},
		{Budget Production Cost},
		{Budget Unit Stumpage},
		ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
SelectedColumnsOutput sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("-", $WorkbookName, $TabName))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Validation_Flag = {Validation Flag},
		Customer,
		Domestic_or_Export = {Domestic or Export},
		Species,
		Product_Type = {Product Type},
		Delivery_Point = {Delivery Point},
		Price_Point = {Price Point},
		Sales_Unit = {Sales Unit},
		Sales_Quantity = {Sales Quantity},
		Average_Sales_Price = {Average Sales Price},
		Sales_Revenue = {Sales Revenue},
		Production_Cost = {Production Cost},
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage = {Unit Stumpage},
		Currency,
		Month,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity = {Budget Sales Quantity},
		Budget_Sales_Revenue = {Budget Sales Revenue},
		Budget_Production_Cost = {Budget Production Cost},
		Budget_Unit_Stumpage = {Budget Unit Stumpage}
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistentParquet
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['testTimberSalesError,csv'],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		{Validation Flag},
		Customer,
		{Domestic or Export},
		Species,
		{Product Type},
		{Delivery Point},
		{Price Point},
		{Sales Unit},
		{Sales Quantity},
		{Average Sales Price},
		{Sales Revenue},
		{Production Cost},
		Stumpage,
		{Unit Stumpage},
		Currency,
		Month,
		{Budget Sales Quantity},
		{Budget Sales Revenue},
		{Budget Production Cost},
		{Budget Unit Stumpage},
		ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
